column3: Latest;Kampot: A video of a fire in a Kampot guest house has been sent to CNE by a witness. The fire apparently broke out in the property close to the old bridge and Divinio pizza
column4: on the night of January 25 at around 8.20 pm.------The fire broke out in Heng Raksmey  guesthouse when an air-conditioner unit malfunctioned in room 107. It was brought under control after 3 fire trucks were called out.
